price: Hakika haya waliyo nayo watu hawa yatakuja angamia, na hayo waliyo kuwa wakiyafanya yamepotea bure.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ مُتَبَّرٞ مَّا هُمۡ فِيهِ وَبَٰطِلٞ مَّا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
footnotes: Hawa mnao waona wanaabudu masanamu, hapana shaka haya walio nayo ni yenye kuangamia, na hii dini waliyo nayo ni potovu , bure bilashi. Na a'mali zao ni zenye kupotea, wala hazibaki.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna hāulāi mutabbarun mā hum fīhi wabāṭilun mā kānū yaʿmalūna
